channel.title: Rate Limiting on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in Rate Limiting on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: azure: [In development] Public Preview: X-Forwarded-For (XFF) grouping for rate limiting on Application Gateway WAF v2
item.description:
Azure Application Gateway WAF v2 now offers Public Preview support for additional rate‑limiting GroupBy options that use the X‑Forwarded‑For (XFF) HTTP header, enabling better client identification when the gateway is behind proxies or CDNs.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Rate limiting for actions cache entries
item.description:
GitHub announced a new rate limit for Actions cache uploads: repositories are limited to 200 new cache entry uploads per minute. Downloads of cache entries are not affected.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: vscode: Introducing auto model selection (preview)
item.description:
VS Code now offers auto model selection (preview) to automatically choose the best AI model for faster responses, reduced rate limiting, and a 10% discount on premium requests for paid users.

  • Source: Visual Studio Code
